package com.cg.beans;

public class Employee {
private String firstName;
private String lastName;
private int age;
public Employee(String firstName, String lastName, int age) {
	super();
	this.firstName = firstName;
	this.lastName = lastName;
	this.age = age;
}
public Employee() {
	super();
	// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
}
public String getFirstName() {
	return firstName;
}
public void setFirstName(String firstName) {
	this.firstName = firstName;
}
public String getLastName() {
	return lastName;
}
public void setLastName(String lastName) {
	this.lastName = lastName;
}
public int getAge() {
	return age;
}
public void setAge(int age) {
	this.age = age;
}
@Override
public String toString() {
	return "Employee [firstName=" + firstName + ", lastName=" + lastName + ", age=" + age + "]";
}


}



---------------------


package com.cg.beans;



import org.springframework.beans.factory.xml.XmlBeanFactory;
import org.springframework.core.io.ClassPathResource;
import org.springframework.core.io.Resource;

public class Client {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		/*Employee emp = new Employee();
		emp.setFirstName("yogini");
		emp.setLastName("Naik");
		emp.setAge(33);
		System.out.println(emp);*/
		
		Resource res = new ClassPathResource("beans.xml");
		XmlBeanFactory factory =new XmlBeanFactory(res);
		
		Employee employee =(Employee) factory.getBean("emp");
		employee.setFirstName("A");
		employee.setLastName("B");
		employee.setAge(20);
		
		System.out.println(employee);
	}

}
---------------
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
	xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" 
	xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
	xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans 
	http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans-4.0.xsd">	
	<bean id="emp" class ="com.cg.beans.Employee"></bean>


</beans>

==========================================
package com.cg.beans;



import org.springframework.beans.factory.xml.XmlBeanFactory;
import org.springframework.core.io.ClassPathResource;
import org.springframework.core.io.Resource;

public class Client {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		
		
		Resource res = new ClassPathResource("beans.xml");
		XmlBeanFactory factory =new XmlBeanFactory(res);
		
		Employee employee =(Employee) factory.getBean("emp");
		
		
		System.out.println(employee);
	}

}


----
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
	xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" 
	xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
	xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans 
	http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans-4.0.xsd">	
	<bean id="emp" class ="com.cg.beans.Employee">
	<property name= "firstName" value ="yogini"></property>
	<property name= "lastName" value ="Naik"></property>
	<property name= "age" value ="32"></property>
	
	</bean>


</beans>




--------------
package com.cg.beans;



import org.springframework.beans.factory.xml.XmlBeanFactory;
import org.springframework.core.io.ClassPathResource;
import org.springframework.core.io.Resource;

public class Client {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		/*Employee emp = new Employee();
		emp.setFirstName("yogini");
		emp.setLastName("Naik");
		emp.setAge(33);
		System.out.println(emp);*/
		
		Resource res = new ClassPathResource("beans.xml");
		XmlBeanFactory factory =new XmlBeanFactory(res);
		
		Employee employee =(Employee) factory.getBean("emp");
		/*employee.setFirstName("A");
		employee.setLastName("B");
		employee.setAge(20);*/
		
		System.out.println(employee);
	}

}
---------------------


<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
	xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" 
	xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
	xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans 
	http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans-4.0.xsd">	
	
	   
		<!-- using setter-->
		<bean id="emp" class ="com.cg.beans.Employee">
		<constructor-arg index ="0" value ="Yogini"></constructor-arg>
		<constructor-arg index ="1" value ="Naik"></constructor-arg>
		<constructor-arg index ="2" value ="33"></constructor-arg>
	
		</bean>
		 
		
		</beans>





====================

package com.cg.beans;

public class Employee {
private String firstName;
private String lastName;
private int age;
public Employee(String firstName, String lastName, int age) {
	super();
	this.firstName = firstName;
	this.lastName = lastName;
	this.age = age;
}
public Employee() {
	super();
	// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
}


public Employee(String name, int age) {
	firstName= name.substring(0,name.indexOf(" "));
	lastName= name.substring(name.indexOf(" ")+1);
	this.age = age;
}


public String getFirstName() {
	return firstName;
}
public void setFirstName(String firstName) {
	this.firstName = firstName;
}
public String getLastName() {
	return lastName;
}
public void setLastName(String lastName) {
	this.lastName = lastName;
}
public int getAge() {
	return age;
}
public void setAge(int age) {
	this.age = age;
}
@Override
public String toString() {
	return "Employee [firstName=" + firstName + ", lastName=" + lastName + ", age=" + age + "]";
}


}
-------------------
package com.cg.beans;



import org.springframework.beans.factory.xml.XmlBeanFactory;
import org.springframework.core.io.ClassPathResource;
import org.springframework.core.io.Resource;

public class Client {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		
		
		Resource res = new ClassPathResource("beans.xml");
		XmlBeanFactory factory =new XmlBeanFactory(res);
		
		Employee employee =(Employee) factory.getBean("emp");
		
		
		System.out.println(employee);
	}

}


---------------------

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
	xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" 
	xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
	xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans 
	http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans-4.0.xsd">	
	
	  
	
		
			 <!-- using constructor injection--> 
		<bean id="emp" class ="com.cg.beans.Employee">
		<constructor-arg type ="String" value ="Yogini Naik"></constructor-arg>
		<constructor-arg type = "int" value ="32"></constructor-arg>
	
		</bean> 
		</beans>
		
==============================================

collection 



package com.cg.beans;

import java.util.ArrayList;

public class Employee {
private String firstName;
private String lastName;
private int age;
ArrayList<String> skills;
public Employee(String firstName, String lastName, int age) {
	super();
	this.firstName = firstName;
	this.lastName = lastName;
	this.age = age;
	
}
public Employee() {
	super();
	// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
}


public Employee(String name, int age) {
	firstName= name.substring(0,name.indexOf(" "));
	lastName= name.substring(name.indexOf(" ")+1);
	this.age = age;
}


public ArrayList<String> getSkills() {
	return skills;
}
public void setSkills(ArrayList<String> skills) {
	this.skills = skills;
}
public String getFirstName() {
	return firstName;
}
public void setFirstName(String firstName) {
	this.firstName = firstName;
}
public String getLastName() {
	return lastName;
}
public void setLastName(String lastName) {
	this.lastName = lastName;
}
public int getAge() {
	return age;
}
public void setAge(int age) {
	this.age = age;
}
@Override
public String toString() {
	return "Employee [firstName=" + firstName + ", lastName=" + lastName + ", age=" + age + ", skills=" + skills + "]";
}


}


-----------------------


package com.cg.beans;



import org.springframework.beans.factory.xml.XmlBeanFactory;
import org.springframework.core.io.ClassPathResource;
import org.springframework.core.io.Resource;

public class Client {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		
		
		Resource res = new ClassPathResource("beans.xml");
		XmlBeanFactory factory =new XmlBeanFactory(res);
		
		Employee employee =(Employee) factory.getBean("emp");
		
		
		System.out.println(employee);
	}

}

-------------------


<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
	xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" 
	xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
	xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans 
	http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans-4.0.xsd">	
	
	  
	
		
		
			<!--   using constructor injection  --> 
		<bean id="emp" class ="com.cg.beans.Employee">
		<constructor-arg type ="String" value ="Yogini Naik"></constructor-arg>
		<constructor-arg type = "int" value ="32"></constructor-arg>
		<property name="skills">
		<list>
		<value>c</value>
		<value>c++</value>
		<value>java</value>
		<value>hibernate</value>
		<value>spring</value>
		<value>Html 5</value>
		<value>Css</value>
		</list>
		</property>
		</bean> 
		</beans>
				

===========================================

package com.cg.beans;

import java.util.ArrayList;

public class Employee {
private String firstName;
private String lastName;
private int age;
ArrayList<String> skills;
public Employee(String firstName, String lastName, int age) {
	super();
	this.firstName = firstName;
	this.lastName = lastName;
	this.age = age;
	
}
public Employee() {
	super();
	// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
}


public Employee(String name, int age) {
	firstName= name.substring(0,name.indexOf(" "));
	lastName= name.substring(name.indexOf(" ")+1);
	this.age = age;
}


public ArrayList<String> getSkills() {
	return skills;
}
public void setSkills(ArrayList<String> skills) {
	this.skills = skills;
}
public String getFirstName() {
	return firstName;
}
public void setFirstName(String firstName) {
	this.firstName = firstName;
}
public String getLastName() {
	return lastName;
}
public void setLastName(String lastName) {
	this.lastName = lastName;
}
public int getAge() {
	return age;
}
public void setAge(int age) {
	this.age = age;
}
@Override
public String toString() {

	return "Employee [firstName=" + firstName + ", lastName=" + lastName + ", age=" + age + ", skills=" + skills + "]";
}


}
------------------


package com.cg.beans;



import org.springframework.beans.factory.xml.XmlBeanFactory;
import org.springframework.core.io.ClassPathResource;
import org.springframework.core.io.Resource;

public class Client {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		/*Employee emp = new Employee();
		emp.setFirstName("yogini");
		emp.setLastName("Naik");
		emp.setAge(33);
		System.out.println(emp);*/
		
		Resource res = new ClassPathResource("beans.xml");
		XmlBeanFactory factory =new XmlBeanFactory(res);
		
		Employee employee =(Employee) factory.getBean("emp");
		/*employee.setFirstName("A");
		employee.setLastName("B");
		employee.setAge(20);*/
		
		System.out.println(employee);
		
		
		
		
		UserCredentials users= (UserCredentials) factory.getBean("cred");
		System.out.println(users);
	}

}
------------------------
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
	xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" 
	xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
	xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans 
	http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans-4.0.xsd">	
	<!--  
	using setter injection
	
	<bean id="emp" class ="com.cg.beans.Employee">
	<property name= "firstName" value ="yogini"></property>
	<property name= "lastName" value ="Naik"></property>
	<property name= "age" value ="32"></property>
	
	</bean>

	-->
	  
	<!-- 
		using setter
		<bean id="emp" class ="com.cg.beans.Employee">
		<constructor-arg index ="0" value ="Yogini"></constructor-arg>
		<constructor-arg index ="1" value ="Naik"></constructor-arg>
		<constructor-arg index ="2" value ="33"></constructor-arg>
	
		</bean>
		 -->
		
		
			<!--   using constructor injection  --> 
		<bean id="emp" class ="com.cg.beans.Employee">
		<constructor-arg type ="String" value ="Yogini Naik"></constructor-arg>
		<constructor-arg type = "int" value ="32"></constructor-arg>
		<property name="skills">
		<list>
		<value>c</value>
		<value>c++</value>
		<value>java</value>
		<value>hibernate</value>
		<value>spring</value>
		<value>Html 5</value>
		<value>Css</value>
		</list>
		</property>
		</bean> 
		<bean id ="cred" class="com.cg.beans.UserCredentials" >
		<property name ="credentials">
		<map>
		<entry key ="user1 " value ="user1@123" ></entry>
		<entry key ="user2 " value ="user2@123" ></entry>
		<entry key =" user3" value ="user3@123" ></entry>
		<entry key =" user4" value ="user4@123" ></entry>
		<entry key =" user5" value ="user5@123" ></entry>
		<entry key =" user6" value ="user6@123" ></entry>
		
		</map>
		
		</property>
		
		
		</bean>
		
		
		</beans>
		


---------------------------


package com.cg.beans;

import java.util.HashMap;

public class UserCredentials {
HashMap<String, String> credentials;

public HashMap<String, String> getCredentials() {
	return credentials;
}

public void setCredentials(HashMap<String, String> credentials) {
	this.credentials = credentials;
}

@Override
public String toString() {
	System.out.println("\n");
	return "UserCredentials [credentials=" + credentials + "]"+"\n";
}



}
====================================
02 
now yo want one to many 
-------------------
package com.cg.beans;

import java.util.ArrayList;

public class Employee {
private String firstName;
private String lastName;
private int age;
private Department dept;

public Employee(String firstName, String lastName, int age) {
	super();
	this.firstName = firstName;
	this.lastName = lastName;
	this.age = age;
	
}
public Employee() {
	super();
	//dept = new Department(1,"IT";)
	// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
}


public Employee(String name, int age) {
	firstName= name.substring(0,name.indexOf(" "));
	lastName= name.substring(name.indexOf(" ")+1);
	this.age = age;
}



public Department getDept() {
	return dept;
}
public void setDept(Department dept) {
	this.dept = dept;
}
public String getFirstName() {
	return firstName;
}
public void setFirstName(String firstName) {
	this.firstName = firstName;
}
public String getLastName() {
	return lastName;
}
public void setLastName(String lastName) {
	this.lastName = lastName;
}
public int getAge() {
	return age;
}
public void setAge(int age) {
	this.age = age;
}
@Override
public String toString() {
	return "Employee [firstName=" + firstName + ", lastName=" + lastName + ", age=" + age + ", dept=" + dept + "]";
}



}
------



package com.cg.beans;

public class Department {
	
	private int deptNo;
	private String deptName;
	public Department() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}
	public Department(int deptNo, String deptName) {
		super();
		this.deptNo = deptNo;
		this.deptName = deptName;
	}
	public int getDeptNo() {
		return deptNo;
	}
	public void setDeptNo(int deptNo) {
		this.deptNo = deptNo;
	}
	public String getDeptName() {
		return deptName;
	}
	public void setDeptName(String deptName) {
		this.deptName = deptName;
	}
	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "Department [deptNo=" + deptNo + ", deptName=" + deptName + "]";
	}
	
	
	
	

}


---------------


package com.cg.beans;



import org.springframework.beans.factory.xml.XmlBeanFactory;
import org.springframework.core.io.ClassPathResource;
import org.springframework.core.io.Resource;

public class Client {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
	
		
		Resource res = new ClassPathResource("beans.xml");
		XmlBeanFactory factory =new XmlBeanFactory(res);	
		Employee employee1= (Employee) factory.getBean("emp1");
		Employee employee2= (Employee) factory.getBean("emp2");
		System.out.println(employee1);
		System.out.println(employee2);
		
		
		
		
	}

}




------------------
package com.cg.beans;

import java.util.HashMap;

public class UserCredentials {
HashMap<String, String> credentials;

public HashMap<String, String> getCredentials() {
	return credentials;
}

public void setCredentials(HashMap<String, String> credentials) {
	this.credentials = credentials;
}

@Override
public String toString() {
	
	return "UserCredentials [credentials=" + credentials + "]";
}



}


------------
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
	xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" 
	xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
	xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans 
	http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans-4.0.xsd">	
	
	  
	
		
		<bean id="emp1" class ="com.cg.beans.Employee">
		<property name= "firstName" value ="yogini"></property>
		<property name= "lastName" value ="Naik"></property>
		<property name= "age" value ="32"></property>
													<!-- <property name= "dept" >
													 <bean  class ="com.cg.beans.Department">
													</bean> 
													</property> -->
		<property name ="dept" ref ="d1"></property>
		</bean>
		
		<bean  id ="d1"  class ="com.cg.beans.Department">
		<property name= "deptNo" value ="1"></property>
		<property name= "deptName" value ="admin"></property>
	
		</bean>
		
		<bean id="emp2" class ="com.cg.beans.Employee">
		<property name= "firstName" value ="Ashish"></property>
		<property name= "lastName" value ="Bhatia"></property>
		<property name= "age" value ="78"></property>
		
		<property name ="dept" ref ="d1"></property>
		
		</bean>
		
		</beans>
		


========================================


autowiring 
		-- byName
		--byType
		--constructor



----
package com.cg.beans;

import java.util.ArrayList;

public class Employee {
private String firstName;
private String lastName;
private int age;
private Department dept;

public Employee(String firstName, String lastName, int age) {
	super();
	this.firstName = firstName;
	this.lastName = lastName;
	this.age = age;
	
}


public Employee(Department dept)
{
	this.dept =dept;
}
public Employee() {
	super();
	//dept = new Department(1,"IT";)
	// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
}


public Employee(String name, int age) {
	firstName= name.substring(0,name.indexOf(" "));
	lastName= name.substring(name.indexOf(" ")+1);
	this.age = age;
}



public Department getDept() {
	return dept;
}
public void setDept(Department dept) {
	this.dept = dept;
}
public String getFirstName() {
	return firstName;
}
public void setFirstName(String firstName) {
	this.firstName = firstName;
}
public String getLastName() {
	return lastName;
}
public void setLastName(String lastName) {
	this.lastName = lastName;
}
public int getAge() {
	return age;
}
public void setAge(int age) {
	this.age = age;
}
@Override
public String toString() {
	return "Employee [firstName=" + firstName + ", lastName=" + lastName + ", age=" + age + ", dept=" + dept + "]";
}



}


--------

package com.cg.beans;

public class Department {
	
	private int deptNo;
	private String deptName;
	public Department() {
		super();
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}
	public Department(int deptNo, String deptName) {
		super();
		this.deptNo = deptNo;
		this.deptName = deptName;
	}
	public int getDeptNo() {
		return deptNo;
	}
	public void setDeptNo(int deptNo) {
		this.deptNo = deptNo;
	}
	public String getDeptName() {
		return deptName;
	}
	public void setDeptName(String deptName) {
		this.deptName = deptName;
	}
	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "Department [deptNo=" + deptNo + ", deptName=" + deptName + "]";
	}
	
	
	
	

}
-----

package com.cg.beans;



import org.springframework.beans.factory.xml.XmlBeanFactory;
import org.springframework.core.io.ClassPathResource;
import org.springframework.core.io.Resource;

public class Client {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
	
		
		Resource res = new ClassPathResource("beans.xml");
		XmlBeanFactory factory =new XmlBeanFactory(res);	
		Employee employee1= (Employee) factory.getBean("emp1");
		Employee employee2= (Employee) factory.getBean("emp2");
		System.out.println(employee1);
		System.out.println(employee2);
		
		
		
		
	}
}

----------------

package com.cg.beans;

import java.util.HashMap;

public class UserCredentials {
HashMap<String, String> credentials;

public HashMap<String, String> getCredentials() {
	return credentials;
}

public void setCredentials(HashMap<String, String> credentials) {
	this.credentials = credentials;
}

@Override
public String toString() {
	
	return "UserCredentials [credentials=" + credentials + "]";
}



}


--------------

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
	xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" 
	xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
	xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans 
	http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans-4.0.xsd">	
	<!--  
	using setter injection
	
	<bean id="emp" class ="com.cg.beans.Employee">
	<property name= "firstName" value ="yogini"></property>
	<property name= "lastName" value ="Naik"></property>
	<property name= "age" value ="32"></property>
	
	</bean>

	-->
	  
	<!-- 
		using setter
		<bean id="emp" class ="com.cg.beans.Employee">
		<constructor-arg index ="0" value ="Yogini"></constructor-arg>
		<constructor-arg index ="1" value ="Naik"></constructor-arg>
		<constructor-arg index ="2" value ="32"></constructor-arg>
	
		</bean>
		 -->
		
		<bean id="emp1" class ="com.cg.beans.Employee" autowire ="constructor">       <!--  byType orbyName or constructor-->
		<property name= "firstName" value ="A"></property>
		<property name= "lastName" value ="B"></property>
		<property name= "age" value ="32"></property>
													<!-- <property name= "dept" >
													 <bean  class ="com.cg.beans.Department">
													</bean> 
													</property> -->
		<!-- <property name ="dept" ref ="d1"></property> -->
		</bean>
		
		<bean  id ="d1"  class ="com.cg.beans.Department">
		<property name= "deptNo" value ="1"></property>
		<property name= "deptName" value ="admin"></property>
	
		</bean>
		
		<bean  id ="dept"  class ="com.cg.beans.Department">
		<property name= "deptNo" value ="2"></property>
		<property name= "deptName" value ="finance"></property>
	
		</bean>
		
		<bean id="emp2" class ="com.cg.beans.Employee">
		<property name= "firstName" value ="C"></property>
		<property name= "lastName" value ="D"></property>
		<property name= "age" value ="78"></property>
		
		<property name ="dept" ref ="d1"></property>
		
		</bean>
		
		</beans>
